Best Sellers Rank #171 in Home & Kitchen (See Top 100 in Home & Kitchen)
#5 in Humidifiers
Date First Available September 21, 2020

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $27.97
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:16:33 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Humidifiers 250ML & 2L

Humidifiers 4L & 6L

Tank Cleaners & Heating Pads

Heating Pads & Massagers

Heating Wrap & Spin Scrubbers

THE PERFECT BALANCE BETWEEN POWER AND PORTABILITY: The lightweight compact, slim design makes it the perfect choice for any environment. A great humidifier for bedroom, office, baby room, or car, just turn it on, and enjoy better, healthier air
BOOST COMFORT LEVELS INSTANTLY: The ultrasonic cool mist humidifier comes with two mist modes – continuous & intermittent – able to change the environmental humidity in minutes. An intuitive one-button control, without needless and complicated settings, and an auto shut-off feature for your safety and calmness
INSTANT DRYNESS FIXER: YOUR LUNGS WILL THANK YOU! Our brand new humidifier for bedroom or office incorporates an elegant, compact design, making it super-portable and easy to use. Erie desk humidifier will fine-tune the humidity levels of your surroundings, allowing you to breathe a healthier air, and make your environment a lot more pleasant
SLEEP TIGHT: While you are sound asleep, our humidifiers for bedrooms moisturize the room at the 38dB noise level. The unit is as quiet as a ticking clock
SILENT STEALTHY FUNCTION FOR DREAMY NIGHTS: Great for sleeping, it also doubles as a night-light! Soft on your eyes, this nifty little feature makes it the ideal humidifier to use at night or as a baby humidifier for nursery, offering a relaxed, quiet environment for a sound and healthy sleep.
1-YEAR WARRANTY: RISK-FREE PURCHASE & HASSLE-FREE REPLACEMENT. Please don’t hesitate to reach out. We would be more than willing to assist! Just a little tip: to increase the life of the humidifier, we recommend using GENIANI Cotton Sticks.

Geniani Erie Humidifier

Introducing the newest innovation of air humidifiers for home or office!

The Erie Humidifier is a compact, yet powerful instant dryness fixer. Now you can have the capabilities of a room humidifier in a fabulous portable version. The mini humidifier also helps with the relief of allergy symptoms and dry cough.

Key features:

  • Sleek design & smart features
  • Portable, yet powerful
  • Offers up to 8 hours runtime
  • Silent action & night-light feature
  • Cost-effective compared to larger versions

Maintenance couldn’t be simpler!

Just a little effort to refill

The Erie personal humidifier can be refilled in seconds. Gently, with a single movement, unscrew the humidifier clockwise to fill it with water.

All-day or All-night Performance

You won’t have to worry about frequent refills since its 0.06 gal (250 ml) capacity is enough to last an entire office day, or night’s sleep.

Convenience at its best

This silent humidifier is such a great addition to an office, quietly working its magic for better air. It’s powered by most USB ports or sockets. Please note. The humidifier is not equipped with a battery; it is powered by a USB cord only.

One-button Control

Simple and intuitive one-button control to switch between operating modes. No hassle, just simple for optimal convenience.

Read more

Dry air is a definite plant killer. Just like your lungs need fresher air, so do most plants need a certain level of humidity to thrive. This small humidifier for plants will keep the air at optimum humidity level, so your lovely plants will have all the moisture they need to flourish.

At home – Perfect. At the office – Perfect. In the car – Perfect

Moisturize your skin

Moisturizing helps your skin stay young and reduces the chances of skin problems.

Safe for babies

With auto-shut off and a unique nightlight function, our humidifier is a nursery room must have! Ensure your children are receiving quality air throughout the night.

Quiet like breath

Ultra-quiet <30dB operating mode to deliver utterly silent operation.

Fits on cup holder

Designed in a sleek round style which allows it to fit in small spaces such as vehicle cup holders.

Read more





Erie White
Erie Black
Huron White
Huron Black

Cordless Massager

GPS True

Device interface – primary Touchscreen

Audio Jack 3.5 mm
Form Factor Bar
Colour Night Mist
Battery Power Rating 5000 Milliampere Hour (mAh)
Phone Talk Time 21.5 Hours
Phone Standy Time (with data) 340 hours
Included Components 1 x Type-C Cable, 1 x 18W Charger (9V 2A), 1 x Sim Card Tray Pin, 1 x TCL 30 XL Mobile phone, 1 x LCD sticker
Manufacturer TCL
Country of Origin China
Date First Available May 11, 2022

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $199.99 - $179.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:40:40 UTC – Details)



Unlocked Smartphone

The TCL 30XL works with most major U.S. carriers, including Verizon, AT&T and T-Mobile (Sprint not included). This android phone is also compatible with Metro PCS, Simple Mobile, Cricket, Ultra Mobile, H2O, Tello, Consumer Cellular, RedPocket (Only GSMA network), Pure talk, Viya, etc. If your phone doesn’t work with Verizon, please restart the phone. If your cell phone experiences an error when making calls on Verizon, your account may need to be provisioned to support “CDMA-less” devices with the assistance of Verizon’s technical support team or your account’s business representative. For Straight Talk and TracFone, this model only supports T-Mobile and AT&T compatible Sim cards but does not support Verizon compatible sim card. This mobile phone isn’t compatible with other CDMA networks, such as Sprint, Assurance wireless, Spectrum, Xfinity, Boost Mobile, etc.

WIFI Calling:

This phone supports WIFI Calling on the following Carriers: T-Mobile, Metro, Straight talk(AT&T and T-Mobile), Simple, Cricket, Ultra.

Technical Parameters：

Display: 6.82 inch V-notch HD+ 20.5:9 display (720 x 1640 pixels)
Screen: LCD
Screen-to-body ratio: 90%
AI Quad Camera: 50MP Main Camera+5MP Ultra-Wide Angle Camera+2MP Macro Camera+2MP Depth Camera
Front camera resolution: 13MP
Chipset: MT6762V
CPU: 4*A53 2.0Ghz + 4*A53 1.5Ghz Octa-Core
GPU: IMG GE8320
Memory: 6GB RAM + 64GB ROM (Expandable up to 512GB with Micro SD card, SD card not included)
Dimensions: 6.78 x 3.03 x 0.36 inch
Weight (g): 204.4g
Battery: 5000mAh 9V2A
2G Bands: GSM 850/900/1800/1900
3G Bands: B2/4/5
4G LTE Bands: B2/4/5/12 (MFBI)/13/66/71/25/26/41HPUE
Sim Card: Single Sim, Nano-sized
Audio: Dual Speaker
Audio Jack: 3.5mm audio jack
System Language: English, Spanish and French

What’s Included

1 x TCL 30 XL Mobile phone
1 x 18W Charger (9V 2A)
1 x Type-C Cable
1 x Sim Card Tray Pin
1 x Quick Guide
1 x LCD sticker
1 x Product Safety Information

Cinematic Viewing Experience – Featuring a 6.82 inch expansive screen with 20.5:9 aspect ratio and dual speakers design, the TCL 30XL android phone allows you to enjoy the thrill of cinematic viewing. The unique TCL NXTVISION Technology is able to boost color, clarity and contrast of visuals while protecting your eyes from harmful blue light. This TCL phone can work as a decent gaming phone, and is also perfect for streaming video and making video calls.
Large Battery, Fun for All Day – The 5000mAh mighty battery of this unlocked android smartphone can power up your entertainment for up to 3 days on one charge (estimated data based on internal lab test). With 18W fast-charging and an on-the-go reverse charging (OTG cable not included) option you can fuel and refuel your mobile phone in an instant.
Powerful, Smooth and Safe – With the 6GB Ram storage and Octa-Core processor, this unlocked cell phone provides you with an instant response time. Keep all of your precious memories with the 64GB built-in storage, and even more with a Micro SD card (sold separately) that lets you add up to 512GB memory. You can also multitask smoothly thanks to the Android 12 operating system and the floating window mode. The phone’s face unlock technology brings a carefree experience with abundant joy.
Seize the Beauty of Life – Explore the allure of highly detailed shots and broad landscape with the 50MP AI quad camera of this android phone. The AI camera system can optimize your picture according to different lighting conditions, and clear any unnecessary object that you select in the background, allowing you to be the protagonist all the time. The 13MP front-facing selfie camera of this stylish smartphone can capture you in a unique way.

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $928.98
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:31:44 UTC – Details)


Dell Inspiron 3910 Desktop – Intel Core i7-12700 processor, 16GB DDR4 RAM, 512GB SSD, Intel UHD 770 Graphics, Intel Wi-Fi 6, 2 Years + 6 Months Retail Dell Migrate, Windows 11 Pro – Mist Blue
12th Gen Intel Core i7-12700 processor (12-Core, 25M Cache, 2.1GHz to 4.8GHz)
16GB (16GBx1) 3200MHz DDR4; 512GB M.2 PCIe NVMe Solid State Drive
Intel Wi-Fi 6 2×2 (Gig+) and Bluetooth 5.2

  1. Anything and everything

    With 12th Gen Intel Core processors and UHD graphics, you have the tools you need for smooth and seamless multitasking.

    • 12th Gen Intel Core i7-12700 Processor (12-Core, 25M Cache, 2.1GHz to 4.8GHz)
    • Intel UHD Graphics 770 with shared graphics Memory
    • 512GB M.2 PCIe NVMe Solid State Drive Storage
    • 16 GB, DDR4, 3200 MHz Memory

  2. Windows 11 brings you closer to what you love

    Family, friends, obsessions, music, creations—Windows 11 is the one place for it all. With a fresh new feel and tools that make it easier to be efficient, it has what you need for whatever’s next.

  3. Sustainability Comes Naturally.

    Dell incorporates sustainability into everything we do, from choosing sustainable materials for products and packaging to reusing, remanufacturing or responsibly recycling them at the end of their lifecycle.


More room in any room

With a 14.7L chassis this new compact desktop fits just about anywhere in your home, without sacrificing performance.

Easy connecting

There’s no waiting on an unstable signal with the new Wifi 6. It gives you a wider range, more stability and faster connection speeds. Plus, a Display Port that makes it easy to connect up to three FHD monitors or one 4K monitor.

Accessing your media is easy too. Media Card Reader allows you to access videos and photos just about whenever you want.

Dimensions

1. Height: 324.3 mm 2. Width: 154 mm 3. Depth: 293 mm
